title: Snowfall LWP 1.3.2
text:
Snowfall LWP 1.3.2
Appling TM– Freeware – Android
out of 7715 votes
Snowfall Live Wallpaper offers a delightful combination of day and night themes, complete with serene snowfall, stunning sun effects, a tranquil moonlit night scene, and specially added Christmas lights for that extra touch! This wallpaper utilizes OpenGL rendering technology, ensuring smooth performance on both phones and tablets.
To set it as your wallpaper: Go to your home screen, long press, select "Wallpapers".
Overview
Snowfall LWP is a Freeware software in the category System Utilities developed by
Appling TM.
The latest version of Snowfall LWP is 1.3.2, released on 01/15/2024. It was initially added to our database on 01/15/2024.
Snowfall LWP runs on the following operating systems: Android.
Users of Snowfall LWP gave it a rating of 4 out of 5 stars.
